thread.title: Angola: Huambo - Minister Praises Organizational Level of Gravel Extracting Companies
thread.title_full: Angola: Huambo - Minister Praises Organizational Level of Gravel Extracting Companies

title: Angola: Huambo - Minister Praises Organizational Level of Gravel Extracting Companies
text:
Zambia: Ambassador's Wife Arrested for Attempted Murder 
He also said that the organizational facilitates the legalization of the cooperatives and the possibility of some being elevated to the category of semi-industrial. 
Francisco Manuel de Queiroz also praised the co-operation of companies linked to the industrial form of grazels in the province because they are contributing to build schools and health centres in the localities in which they operate. 
"We have noticed a very strong intervention in the social area by companies that are exploring the stones, we have observed the emergence of schools in communities and other infrastructures that are contributing to improve the population's quality of life", he said. Angola
